sentences.sContent: In the distance, the detritus of a century of oil exploration lines the horizon.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the distance, the detritus of a century of oil exploration lines the horizon.
sentences.sCn: 在远方地平线上，矗立着一个世纪以来开采石油产生的碎石堆。

sentences.sContent: We have emptied the bus of all our detritus.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have emptied the bus of all our detritus.
sentences.sCn: 我们把所有零碎东西从巴士上清理下来。

sentences.sContent: Indeed, once this detritus of our ignorant past has been cleared away, we might see more clearly the nature of good, and pursue it aright at last.
sentences.sContent_eng: Indeed, once this detritus of our ignorant past has been cleared away, we might see more clearly the nature of good, and pursue it aright at last.
sentences.sCn: 的确，一旦当我们这些琐碎的无知正为过去，我们将看到更加清晰的自然地面目，并且永远追随正确的步伐。

trans.tranOther: pieces of waste that remain after something has been broken up or used
